items.name: City Park
items.address: 100 Park Ave, Freetown, Sierra Leone, West Africa
items.description: A beautiful 50-acre park with walking trails, playgrounds, and picnic areas perfect for family outings.

items.name: Historical Museum
items.address: 200 History Lane, Freetown, Sierra Leone, West Africa
items.description: Explore our city's rich history through interactive exhibits and artifacts dating back to the 1800s.

items.name: Riverwalk
items.address: 300 Riverside Drive, Freetown, Sierra Leone, West Africa
items.description: Scenic 2-mile paved trail along the river with beautiful views and outdoor art installations.

items.name: Downtown Plaza
items.address: 400 Main Street, Freetown, Sierra Leone, West Africa
items.description: The heart of our city featuring shops, restaurants, and frequent community events.

items.name: Science Center
items.address: 500 Innovation Way, Freetown, Sierra Leone, West Africa
items.description: Interactive science exhibits for all ages, including a planetarium and robotics lab.

items.name: Botanical Gardens
items.address: 600 Flora Street, Freetown, Sierra Leone, West Africa
items.description: 20 acres of themed gardens showcasing native plants and exotic species from around the world.

items.name: Performing Arts Center
items.address: 700 Culture Avenue, Freetown, Sierra Leone, West Africa
items.description: State-of-the-art venue hosting concerts, plays, and dance performances year-round.

items.name: Sports Complex
items.address: 800 Champion Boulevard, Freetown, Sierra Leone, West Africa
items.description: Premier athletic facility with pools, courts, and fields for community sports and events.
